column4: how do i turn of the beeps in ubuntu? For example, when I hit backspace and there is "no more room" to go.
I installed starup-manager, but I don't know how to bring it up.
dpkg -L startup-manager | grep bin ... one of those  :P  I'm leaving for a bit though.
go to 'ctrl + alt + f8' and logout
thanks. are there themes for that?
screenlets is the nicest by far... they are actual mini apps rather than just html boxes
and can i find these themes on deviant art or is there a specific website you prefer?
i installed screenlets from apt-get. how do i star it?
it's not there. it installed fine in apt-get. no errors
run the appropriate with a & after it.
